ctx: intros n f A B H1 H2.
intros n f A B H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T n : nat f : naryFunc n A, B : Formula H1 : SysPrf T (iffH A B) H2 : RepresentableHelp n f A Unable to unify "RepresentableHelp n f (iffH A B)" with "(fix RepresentableHelp (n : nat) : naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop := match n as n0 return (naryFunc n0 -> Formula -> Prop) with | 0 => fun (f : naryFunc 0) (A : Formula) => SysPrf T (iffH A (equal (var 0) (natToTerm f))) | S m => fun (f : naryFunc (S m)) (A : Formula) => forall a : nat, RepresentableHelp m (f a) (substituteFormula LNN A (S m) (natToTerm a)) end) n f B".

ctx: intros n f A B H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System H : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), RepresentableHalf1 n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 n f A -> RepresentableHelp n f A f0 : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T n : nat f : naryFunc n A, B : Formula H2 : RepresentableHelp n f A x : fol.Formulas LNN x0 : folProof.Prf LNN x (iffH A B) H1 : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g Unable to unify "RepresentableHalf1 n f A" with "(fix RepresentableHelp (n : nat) : naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop := match n as n0 return (naryFunc n0 -> Formula -> Prop) with | 0 => fun (f : nat) (A : Formula) => SysPrf T (f0 A (equal (var 0) (natToTerm f))) | S m => fun (f : nat -> naryFunc m) (A : Formula) => forall a : nat, RepresentableHelp m (f a) (substituteFormula LNN A (S m) (natToTerm a)) end) n f B".

original: intros n f A B H1 H2. unfold RepresentableHelp. intros H3 H4. apply (RepresentableHalfHelp n f (iffH A B)). - apply (RepresentableHalf1Alternate n f A B).
